Code4Lib NYS 2016 Unconference

Thursday & Friday, August 4-5, 2016 at Cornell University, Ithaca, New York


Find Out More

Code4Lib NYS 2016 Midsummer Meeting

We're planning a Code4Lib New York State (NYS) regional meeting & unconference on August 4-5, 2016. This meeting will be held at Mann Library, Cornell University. The 2-days will be a mix of scheduled/planned and impropmtu sessions, workshops, lightning talks, break out sessions, and hackathons.

A call for sessions, interests and proposals will go out on the Code4Lib National, New York State, and New York City listservs in mid-March. Information on a schedule and registration will go out this Spring. If you are interested now in helping organize the event, please email Christina Harlow, check out our public planning document, and/or join the C4L NYS 2016 Planning Google Group.

C4L NYS 2016 Logistics

Where

Mann Library Rooms 160 (primary room) and 102 (workshop/breakout space). Mann Library is on the West side of the 'Agriculture Quad' on the Cornell University campus in Ithaca, New York. See the map below for getting around the Cornell campus.

When

Thursday and Friday, August 4-5, 2016. The schedule will run approximately 9 AM to 5 PM on both days, with a break for lunch on your own. A schedule will be released later this Spring, along with other logistical information.
